name: Date Bark

instructions.action: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Melt dark chocolate in a double boiler or microwave, stirring until smooth
Pour melted chocolate onto parchment paper and spread evenly into a rectangle
Immediately sprinkle chopped dates, nuts, cranberries, and coconut over the chocolate
Gently press the toppings into the chocolate
Refrigerate for 2 hours until completely set
Break into irregular pieces and serve

tips: Use high-quality chocolate for best results
Work quickly after spreading chocolate so toppings stick
Store in airtight container in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
Customize with your favorite nuts and dried fruits
